const Scorecard = ({ data }) => { const emptyRow = { name: '-', runs: '-', balls: '-', fours: '-', sixes: '-', strike_rate: '-', dismissal: '-', }; const renderTable = (team, title) => (

{title}

{team && team.length > 0 ? team.map((player, index) => ( )) : [emptyRow].map((player, index) => ( ))}
Name Runs Balls Fours Sixes Strike Rate Dismissal
{player.name || '-'} {player.runs || '-'} {player.balls || '-'} {player.fours || '-'} {player.sixes || '-'} {player.strike_rate || '-'} {player.dismissal || '-'}
{player.name} {player.runs} {player.balls} {player.fours} {player.sixes} {player.strike_rate} {player.dismissal}
); return (
{data?.home_team && renderTable(data.home_team, data.home_team_name || 'Home Team')} {data?.away_team && renderTable(data.away_team, data.away_team_name || 'Away Team')}
); }; export default Scorecard;
